SpeechNode.text: 'Round here is pretty barren, so he spends most of his time hunting wild game further North.
SpeechNode.name: Sanei2

Option.text: What's so special about the North?

SpeechNode.text: More animals, more vegetation, more everything. But it's also very dangerous. A young woman like you shouldn't wander too far.
SpeechNode.name: Sanei3

SpeechNode.text: Well, there's some kind of Oasis further up. Legend has it, there is some mysterious power just lying there- ripe for the picking!
SpeechNode.name: SaneiA
